description: This table contains information about professional billing transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: A transaction's unique internal identification number. A patient's record can include charges, payments, or adjustments and the patient's account balance will reflect these transactions.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: The date when a transaction is entered into the billing system.  This differs from the service date, which is the date when the service was performed.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The date a medical service is performed.

columns.name: TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of this transaction: Charge, payment or adjustment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Charge


Payment


Adjustment


AP Claim Tx


AP Claim Refund Tx


AP Claim DRG Tx


Pharmacy Claim Tx

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the record that maintains the patient's transactions. A patient may use more than one account and an account may contain more than one patient.

columns.name: DEBIT_CREDIT_FLAG_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains a 1 if the transaction is a debit and a -1 if the transaction is a credit. A charge is always a debit, a payment is always a credit, and an adjustment can be either a debit or a credit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Debit


Credit

columns.name: SERV_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The internal identifier of the provider who performed the medical services on the patient.

columns.name: BILLING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The billing provider associated with the transaction.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department ID of the department associated with the transaction.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service ID of the place of service associated with the transaction

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The location ID of the location associated with the transaction.

columns.name: SERVICE_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area ID of the service area associated with the transaction.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ONE
columns.description: The first procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_TWO
columns.description: The second procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_THREE
columns.description: The third procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_FOUR
columns.description: The fourth procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_ID
columns.description: The primary diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.

columns.name: DX_TWO_ID
columns.description: The second diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.

columns.name: DX_THREE_ID
columns.description: The third diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.

columns.name: DX_FOUR_ID
columns.description: The fourth diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.

columns.name: DX_FIVE_ID
columns.description: The fifth diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.

columns.name: DX_SIX_ID
columns.description: The sixth diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.

columns.name: PROCEDURE_QUANTITY
columns.description: The quantity as entered in Charge Entry for the procedure of this transaction (TX_ID). If the row has a DETAIL_TYPE value of 10-13, this column displays a negative value. If the row has a DETAIL_TYPE value of 20-33, 43-45, 50, or 51, this column displays a zero.

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.description: The original amount of this transaction.

columns.name: OUTSTANDING_AMT
columns.description: The outstanding amount of the transaction.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMT
columns.description: The insurance portion of the transaction.

columns.name: PATIENT_AMT
columns.description: The patient or self-pay portion of the transaction.

columns.name: VOID_DATE
columns.description: If this transaction is voided, this column will have the date in which this transaction is voided.

columns.name: LAST_ACTION_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the most recent date when an action is performed on this transaction.

columns.name: PROV_SPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the provider specialty of the provider associated with the transaction. The procedure category of the charge on the transaction may affect what specialty is recorded here and in the "Encounter Specialty" displayed in Hyperspace.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The Procedure ID of the procedure associated with the transaction.

columns.name: TOTAL_MATCH_AMT
columns.description: This column contains the total amount matched to the transaction, including adjustments.

columns.name: TOTAL_MTCH_INS_AMT
columns.description: This column contains the total insurance amount matched to the transaction, including adjustments.

columns.name: TOTAL_MTCH_ADJ
columns.description: This column contains the total adjustment amount matched to the transaction.

columns.name: TOTAL_MTCH_INS_ADJ
columns.description: This column contains the total insurance adjustment amount matched to the transaction.

columns.name: REPOST_ETR_ID
columns.description: This is the repost source transaction.

columns.name: REPOST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The repost type category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Repost


Correction

columns.name: DISCOUNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The discount type category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


None


Percentage


Fee Schedule


Extension

columns.name: ENC_FORM_NUM
columns.description: The encounter form number corresponding to the charge transaction. If you are not using encounter forms, a negative number is stored in this item.

columns.name: BEN_SELF_PAY_AMT
columns.description: Stores the adjudicated self-pay amount calculated by the benefits engine

columns.name: BEN_ADJ_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: Stores the copay part of the adjudicated self-pay amount calculated by the benefits engine

columns.name: BEN_ADJ_COINS_AMT
columns.description: Stores the coinsurance part of the adjudicated self-pay amount calculated by the benefits engine

columns.name: VISIT_NUMBER
columns.description: This item stores the visit number for this transaction.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Referral (RFL) ID for this transaction.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_EPM_ID
columns.description: This item stores the original payor (EPM) ID for this transaction.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_EPM_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_FC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the original financial class for this transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Commercial


Medicare


Medicaid


Self-Pay


Worker's Comp


Tricare


Champva


Group Health Plan


FECA Black Lung


Blue Shield


Medigap


Other


DK Regional


Client

columns.name: ORIGINAL_CVG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the original coverage (CVG) ID for this transaction.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the current payor (EPM) ID for this transaction.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the current coverage (CVG) ID for this transaction.

columns.name: ASGN_YN
columns.description:
This item stores the assignment flag for a coverage.  This item is set to Yes if the charge is currently assigned to the payor in the PAYOR_ID column.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: FACILITY_ID
columns.description: This item stores the facility (EAF) ID for this transaction.

columns.name: PAYMENT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the payment source for credit transactions. This is a list of possible sources including Cash, Check, Credit Card, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cash


Check


Credit Card


EOB


Voucher


Bank Account


Trust Account

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who posted the transaction.

columns.name: NOT_BILL_INS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the transaction is marked for do not bill insurance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CHG_ROUTER_SRC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the universal charge line (UCL) ID for this transaction.

columns.name: RECEIVE_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the charge entry batch receive date.

columns.name: CE_CODED_DATE
columns.description: The date this�charge session was coded, from charge entry.

columns.name: PANEL_ID
columns.description: The ID of the panel procedure that generated this transaction.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: Networked to BIL: the Bill Area for this transaction.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: CREDIT_SRC_MODULE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The module that creates a payment or credit adjustment


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Account Maintenance


Payment Posting


Adjustment Posting


Collection (text)


Collection Workqueue


Charge Entry


Retroadjudication


Small Balance Write-off in Bills


Transfer


Transaction Import


Claim Processing


MyChart Web


Electronic Remittance


Claim Bundling Utility


Real Time Charge Interface


Secondary Write-off


Dental Treatment Plan


Transaction Maintenance Utilities


Follow-up workqueue User


Check-in/Check-out


Charge Homing


Release of Information


Enterprise Payment Posting


Reimbursement Recalculation Utility


Charge Correction


Charge Repost


Claim Edit Workqueue


Patient Refund


HB Integrity Checks


Welcome


PB Extract Framework


SBO Collection Actions


Nightly Processing


Web Service


Auto Pay Payment Plan


Pharmacy


Payment Collection


Financial Assistance


Credit Workqueue System


Credit Workqueue User


Follow-up Workqueue System


Self-Pay Discount


Adjustment Review Workqueue


Charge Router Void


Charge Router Repost


Rescheduling Repost


Prepay Discount Adjustment


Bundled Payment Distribution


Account Workqueue


Claim run Accept


Change Guarantor


MyChart Mobile


Guest Pay


Visit Auto Pay


Dental Upgrade Adjustment


Promotion Discount


Discretionary Discount


Non-Primary Not Allowed Adjustment


Estimate


Adjustment Review WQ Decline


Two-Way SMS

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date that this row was last updated.

columns.name: CLAIM_DATE
columns.description: The most recent date that this transaction has been on an accepted claim run.

columns.name: IPP_INV_NUMBER
columns.description: This item stores the original invoice number that user posts to in GUI payment posting or remittance.

columns.name: IPP_INV_ID
columns.description: This item stores the original invoice ID that user posts to in�graphical user interface�(GUI) payment posting or remittance.
